reviewText: This DVD includes all 17 of the original episodes of the Fleischer Animation Studio's original "Superman" cartoon!  A cool 2 disc set, pulling together the best in early Superman animation.  One disc has 9 episodes on it, and the other 8, and includes these classic cartoons that were originally aired in the 1940's...if you're a fan of Superman, you've gotta have this set!  It's a must-have item for any Superman collection!
